design_philosophy.core_concept: The Abyssal Archive - A dark, immersive interface where productivity is magic and tasks are monsters.
principles: Fusion: Diablo IV UI meets Minimalist SaaS.
Emotion: Every completion feels like a loot drop.
Texture: No flat colors. Use grain, stone, and parchment textures.
Lighting: UI elements should glow, shimmer, or cast shadows.

headings.usage: Page titles, Quest names, Boss names

containers.card_style: bg-[#1c1917] border border-[#44403c] shadow-xl relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-[#fbbf24]/50 transition-all duration-300
containers.quest_item: relative pl-6 border-l-2 border-[#44403c] hover:border-[#fbbf24] transition-colors bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent to-black/20

buttons.primary: bg-[#fbbf24] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-[#f59e0b] shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(251,191,36,0.4)] rounded-sm px-8 py-3 font-cinzel
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#57534e] text-[#a8a29e] hover:text-white hover:border-white uppercase tracking-widest rounded-sm px-8 py-3 font-cinzel
buttons.danger: bg-[#ef4444]/10 border border-[#ef4444]/50 text-[#ef4444] hover:bg-[#ef4444] hover:text-white transition-all uppercase tracking-widest rounded-sm px-8 py-3 font-cinzel

inputs.style: bg-[#0c0a09] border border-[#292524] text-[#fafaf9] focus:border-[#fbbf24] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#fbbf24] rounded-sm h-12 px-4 font-inter

navigation.style: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 md:top-0 md:bottom-auto bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-md border-t md:border-b border-white/10 z-50 h-16 flex items-center justify-center md:justify-between px-6

textures.description: Dark black rock surface for card backgrounds

items.description: Gold chess pieces representing strategy and wealth

layout_strategy.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 p-6 md:p-12 max-w-7xl mx-auto
layout_strategy.hero_section: min-h-[80vh] flex flex-col justify-center items-center text-center relative overflow-hidden

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds unless it's a subtle noise overlay.
Always use 'Cinzel' font for headings to maintain the RPG aesthetic.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states that increase brightness or add a glow.
Avoid pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #0a0a0a or #0c0a09 for depth.
Images must be treated with a slight desaturation or sepia filter to match the dark theme unless they are 'magical' items.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building 'Life RPG'. Use the provided colors and fonts to override the default Tailwind config. Create a 'Layout' component that wraps the app with the dark background and font settings. Use the provided image URLs for the avatar selection and dashboard backgrounds. Implement the 'Quest Card' with the specified border and hover effects.
